item.description: Wiers Hill is in North Andover. Parking is on the side of the road at the main entrance. I have not been there yet this summer but there is a good chance of finding some good shrooms. Google Wiers Hill for dirctions. Please bring bug spray, water, and asmall knife and paper bags for the shrooms. I have had very good luck here in the past and should be good after the warm weather and rain. Hope to see you all there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the "Mushroom Lovers USA" sign!
item.name: Wier Hill in North Andover
